text:
──Sorry for the wait, Producer.
I'll leave the outfit here.

...I still remember
things from the past.

I used to work hard on my piano studies,
practicing to play various songs.

The outfits weren't as flashy as idol costumes,
but I wore formal dresses for recitals.

Oh, the teaching book is called Beyer... because it was
written by a guy named Beyer.

Is that so... I didn't know that.
Should I familiarize myself with those things too?

I wonder... If you ever need the knowledge,
I might be able to teach you a bit.
